description:
### Context

This dataset is created to practice various text classification techniques. 

The text data is collected using [praw API](https://praw.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) from [reddit.com](https://www.reddit.com/). 

### Dataset details
- Number of classes: 3 (Physics, Chemistry, and Biology)
- Total number of data points:  10281 comments 
- The number of words in **train** comments ranges from 1 word to 1274 words
- The number of words in **test** comments ranges from 26 words to  837 words
 
### EDA and Baseline approach
 [Physics vs Chemistry vs Biology: EDA & Baseline](https://www.kaggle.com/vivmankar/physics-vs-chemistry-vs-biology-eda-baseline)
title: Physics vs Chemistry vs Biology
